org.sebastiandine.cardcollectionmanager.services

Class MtgApiClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sebastiandine.cardcollectionmanager.services.MtgApiClient

  • public class MtgApiClient
extends java.lang.Object
    This class acts as a client to the official MTG API. It is using the Java based encapsulation of the API.
    Author:
    Sebastian Dine

      • MtgApiClient

        public MtgApiClient()

    • Method Detail

      • getCardImage

        public static javax.swing.ImageIcon getCardImage(CardBean cardBean)
        This method posts a request to the offical MtG API and returns the corresponding image of the given CardBean object. If no image has been found, it returns the standard MtG card back image.
        Parameters:
        cardBean - CardBean object to which an image request should be posted to the API.
        Returns:
        ImageIcon object of the offical image of the given CardBean object. If no image has been found, the standard MtG card back image will be provided.

      • getAllSets

        public static io.magicthegathering.javasdk.resource.MtgSet[] getAllSets()
        This method posts a request to the official MtG API and returns a list of all sets as a list MtgSet objects. This method filters the response of the API and throws out online-only sets. Furthermore the list is sorted by release date ascending.
        Returns:
        List of all Mtg sets, sorted by the release date.
